Html: I'm new to Asp so I'm having difficulty's getting this implemented into the site.. I just want to have it so you can click on the members tab, then click on a member in the members list and have it bring you to their forum profile page.. I think this would be a good feature to be included in the kit.. What do you think? If anyone could help me with this or tell me what I need to do to get this working let me know...
That could easily be done. Give me a day and I'll figure it out for you.

Awesome, thanks allot! Yeah, I'm trying my best to learn asp.net.. I've been working on the video tutorials on asp.net.. I've also gotten tons of tutorials on asp.net and C# that I plan on working on.. Just haven't learned enough yet to make that kind of a change..


z2bass wrote:
That could easily be done. Give me a day and I'll figure it out for you.

Add this under the phone field on the member/list.aspx page


<p>

Forum Profile: <asp:Hyperlink id="ForumProf" runat="server" Text="Forum Profile" NavigateURL='<%# "~/forum/profile.aspx?id=" & Eval("memberid").ToString() %>' />

</p>


Thank You,

Zack Owens, Web Developer & Lead Software Developer
